articles.author: Review by Brian Lowry, CNN
articles.title: 'Fire Island' updates Jane Austen as a gay rom-com without much spark - CNN
articles.description: The long trip to the screen behind "Fire Island," a gay rom-com loosely adapted from Jane Austen's "Pride and Prejudice," may be more interesting than the movie. Developed for the since-defunct Quibi (RIP), the project shifted from the originally planned "qui…
